item.title: FBI: A potential terrorist attack was prevented in Michigan, and multiple arrests were made
item.description: A potential terrorist attack in Michigan was prevented early Friday, the FBI said.

item.title: Trump says Senate should scrap the filibuster to end the government shutdown

item.title: Staffing shortage at Reagan National affects senators trying to fly home amid shutdown impasse

item.title: Trump celebrates win against climate 'hoax' after Bill Gates pivots on global warming

item.title: CNN's Tapper says left-wing indoctrination efforts turning students more conservative
item.description: CNN host Jake Tapper said a backlash to leftist indoctrination in schools is driving skeptical Gen-Z students to become more conservative.
